original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cattāri.)

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Pañca.)

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cha.)

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca

original: hetupaccayā. (Satta.)
analyzed: hetu paccayā satta

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.)

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
